Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare opened her comm link in Bullet's Frecuency, when she 
saw Bullet ran where Chameleon was "Bullet, stop!!! the place is 
blocked if you open it... ALL WILL BE IN THE PIT"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> OOC I'm back, miss me?
> 
> I leave for a short time and the world falls apart, guess I'll have 
to bring some superglue.
> 
> BIC
> 
> Bullet exits his quarters fully recharged and ready to do his duty. 
Even if his duty was to play nursemaid to a lizard. Being sentenced 
to protect Chameleon was a fate worse than death. The bull would've 
rather have faced a fireing squad than bear such indignity.
> 
> Alarms sounded (Logically they'd go off since a virus had been 
released.) chiming the release of a dangerous material into the ships 
atmosphere. Bullet checked the computer for Chameleons location. "Why 
am I not surprised?" he thought when he found that the bot he was to 
protect was right in the middle of the action. He transformed to bull 
and rushed through the halls toward the disturbance hoping the doors 
to that level hadn't blocked it off to protect the rest of the ship.
> 
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: airly2000@y... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Friday, May 11, 2001 10:03 AM
>   Subject: BlackFortres... 
> 
> 
>   Chamaleon/ScorPyo/Thyphon/Elecktra:
> 
>   Scorpyo continue whinning that he liked to help Chaemlon., and he 
shouted "Scorpyo LIKES" and shot against a container that have a 
dangerous virus in gas.
> 
>   CHamaleon ran out side the lab and closed the door, leaving 
Scorpyo inside.  CHamelon looked horrified that gas was leaving the 
lab and and the airtight doors started to close, in area 2. Chameleon 
left area 2  before doors closed  but he fell in stasis lock due the 
virus.
> 
>   Thyphon and ELectra left mes hall and went towards the high risk 
labs where Chameleon was.
>
